name: Mary's Cooking
description:
Mary's Cooking- a brand new Cooking Game! It's not only a time management challenge, but also a story about food, growth and love.

Are you ready to practice yourself from a restaurant trainee to the world-famous master chef? Just prepare,cook and serve tasty food around the world in fantacy restaurants!

If you are a cooking enthusiast, please enjoy various food in Mary's Cooking: steaks, hamburgers, pizza…… as well as unlock kinds of restaurants: Meet Steakhouse, Super Burger, Mr. Lobster…The more levels you play, the more food types and restaurant styles you will unlock!

If you want a little challenge during your chef career, just keep up with the rush hours, tap as fast as you can to satisfy the guests. Feel a little bit difficult? Don't worry, various boosts will help you beat the level!

If you are a fan of love stories, the intricate relationship between Mary and other characters as well as the ups and downs of the plot in the game must not be missed. The story begins on a bad day after being broken up by your boyfriend, but grandpa invites you to manage his restaurant... What's going on next? It's all up to you!

What's more FUN in Mary's Cooking?
-Endless Treasures&Lucky Spin: Enjoy Free Gifts everyday!
-Upgrade Recipes and Utensils：Improve food quality and earn more!
-Collect Key Cards: Travel around the world and unlock restaurants!
-Special Characters: Wonderful story happened!
-Piggy Bank: Help you make more money!
-Foodie's Journey: Bring you bonus!

Download Mary's Cooking now and start your journey as the Master Chef！
